Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Apartamentos Dunas de Liencres in Pielagos (Boo), you'll be within the region of Cabarceno Natural Park and Santander Cathedral. This family-friendly apartment is within the region of Santander Ferry Terminal and Plaza Porticada.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 46 guestrooms, featuring kitchenettes with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and stovetops. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and sofa beds.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as a seasonal outdoor pool or take in the view from a garden. Additional amenities include babysitting/childcare (surcharge), tour/ticket assistance, and a picnic area.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Apartamentos Dunas de Liencres. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
The front desk is staffed during limited hours.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 4:30 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Apartamentos Dunas de Liencres. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Cabarceno Natural Park - 11.7 km / 7.3 mi
Santander Cathedral - 12.6 km / 7.8 mi
Santander Ferry Terminal - 12.6 km / 7.8 mi
Plaza Porticada - 12.7 km / 7.9 mi
La Colegiata - 12.7 km / 7.9 mi
Museo de la Tortura - 12.8 km / 8 mi
Santillana del Mar Zoo - 12.9 km / 8 mi
National Museum and Research Center of Altamira - 13.3 km / 8.3 mi
University of Cantabria - 14 km / 8.7 mi
Palace of Festivals of Cantabria - 14 km / 8.7 mi
El Sardinero Stadium - 14.2 km / 8.8 mi
Caves of Altamira - 14.4 km / 9 mi
Las Monedas Caves - 14.6 km / 9 mi
El Sardinero Beach - 14.9 km / 9.3 mi
Camello Beach - 15.3 km / 9.5 mi

The preferred airport for Apartamentos Dunas de Liencres is Santander (SDR) - 10.5 km / 6.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
